archiefmat.titel: Indices op de protocollen en resoluties en op de journalen
archiefmat.titel_eng: Indices of the protocols and resolutions and of the journals
archiefmat.scope: The Indices form the central access to both the protocols of resolutions and the journals of the Governor. Names (geographical, surnames of individuals) and subjects are listed in a more or less alphabetical order. Short contents, date of the document and the number under which it was filed are mentioned. Some of the indices are copies of the originals made in the 1940's.
archiefmat.notes:
The year 1867 is missing. The complete series up to 1957 consists of 125 volumes.

The numbers of the inventory items may be changed (November 2008).
archiefmat.Aantekeningen:
NB de nummering kan mogelijk nog wijzigen; het archief wordt op dit moment (november 2008) omgenummerd. Later nazien!

Gehele serie 14268-14393.
